channel.title: MrPotatoHead
channel.description:
A topic by him: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340744.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340744.0.html[/url]
Just curious as to where he's gone, I noticed his name and profile being blanked out a while ago but someone just brought it up to me and I had no idea...

item.title: MrPotatoHead
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

lothy is there an interface where you can select multiple and delete with a batch query?

Read full topic

item.title: MrPotatoHead
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ll see if I can restore their accounts and stuff, I did it once a long time ago in SMF 1.1 with PSB, but I remember it being a very painful experience…

Read full topic

item.title: MrPotatoHead
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Sorry I haven’t responded sooner. My last university exam was this morning, and I’ve only been coming on to visit the mitb portion of the community for a few minutes here and there.

I’ve just gone through my administration logs, and I was the person who deleted them:

Deleted member "AuraDevil" 19 January 2011, 19:44:55 Lothy Administrator Deleted member "MrPotatoHead" 19 January 2011, 19:44:55 Lothy Administrator Deleted member "Anarchist`" 19 January 2011, 19:44:55 Lothy Administrator Edited the "MoparScape Vet" group 19 January 2011, 19:15:34 Lothy Administrator
I haven't gone to their profiles and deleted them explicitly, and the logs show that all three actions were performed at precisely the same time, which corroborates this. January 19th would be the day that I changed the Vet rank so that it was a secondary group only (no titles, no coloured names, etc), but I have no idea how I could have deleted accounts in the process. =\

I’ll have to post this in a section that Mopar will see quickly so that he can look at restoring their accounts.

Read full topic

item.title: MrPotatoHead
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:3, topic:396417”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=494201.msg3613619#msg3613619 date=1306799457]He quit and didn’t want anything to do with us anymore.
[/quote][/quote]
I don’t see where he got his information from though, I talked to him probably the most out of the ‘modeller group’ where he would hang, and he just disappeared with no warning… not only that but his account has actually been removed, as far as I know there’s no way he could’ve done that himself.

Read full topic
